name: SPSS Sampling Plan File
summary: Learn about .CSPLAN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Sampling is the statistical process by which studying a small portion of a population produces inferences about the whole population.

description: File created by SPSS, a statistics application; saves the parameters of a sampling plan created using the Sampling Wizard (Analyze → Complex Samples → Select a Sample...); draws the output sample data to a table when opened.
